After talking with @mythmon, we've decided to not try and put all types of experiments under a single filter expression key. To this end, we should rename the normandy.experiments key in filter expressions to normandy.preferenceExperiments and update the docs to reflect this.
We should keep normandy.experiments available as an alias for normandy.preferenceExperiments until we're confident that it'd be safe to remove.

title: Rename normandy.experiments filter to normandy.preferenceExperiments
body:
After talking with @mythmon, we've decided to not try and put all types of experiments under a single filter expression key. To this end, we should rename the `normandy.experiments` key in filter expressions to `normandy.preferenceExperiments` and update the docs to reflect this. 

We should keep `normandy.experiments` available as an alias for `normandy.preferenceExperiments` until we're confident that it'd be safe to remove.
